channel.title: Documentation/Wiki for the RS2 Client's Packet Structures?
channel.description:
I am thinking about starting up a server using either rs2dv or Yz's framework. I have noticed they are quite raw in the amount of packets already structured in their framework, id like to know if theres any information, wiki or documentation about the RS2 Client Protocol.
If there is currently none ill record whatever i can and document it as i go along with it.

item.title: Documentation/Wiki for the RS2 Client's Packet Structures?
item.dc:creator: @originalpker originalpker
item.description:
@originalpker wrote:

Does sound like a good idea…
Might give it a try!

Originalpker~

Read full topic

item.title: Documentation/Wiki for the RS2 Client's Packet Structures?
item.dc:creator: @Razor69 Razor69
item.description:
@Razor69 wrote:

That’s a great idea!
An RSPS wiki!
I’ll set one up on my site asap, the link will be in my sig
EDIT: Wiki Set up
EDIT2: Wiki temporarily removed, going to get a domain set up for it and crap.
